home.title: Eventify - Booking of event spaces
home.description: A unique platform that allows you to book venues and premises quickly and easily, both paid and free.

events.title: Upcoming Events - Eventify
events.description: Browse through upcoming thematic meetings and events. Join us for insightful sessions with expert speakers in cozy locations.

create.title: Create Your Event - Eventify
create.description: Step into Eventify’s intuitive event creation page. In just a few clicks, set up and customize your event, reach a wider audience, and make an impact. Your journey from idea to a fully organized thematic meeting starts here!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - Your Data is Safe with Eventify
privacy.description: At Eventify, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. Read our detailed privacy policy to understand how we collect, use, and safeguard your data, ensuring a secure and transparent experience.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions: Your Guide to Eventify's Policies
terms.description: Get acquainted with Eventify's Terms & Conditions. This page outlines our policies, ensuring transparency and clarity for all users. Read more to understand our guidelines.

cookie.title: Your Data, Your Control: Eventify's Cookie Policy
cookie.description: Discover how Eventify utilizes cookies to enhance your browsing experience. Our Cookie Policy page details their use, ensuring transparency and control over your data.

price.title: Speaker Subscriptions: Choose Your Plan with Eventify
price.description: Amplify your impact with Eventify's speaker subscription plans. From basic to pro, find the perfect tier for your speaking journey. Join us and expand your influence today!

auth.signup_helper: By clicking the "Register" button, you accept the <partnerAgreement>Partner Agreement</partnerAgreement>, confirm that you have read the <personalDataPolicy>Personal Data Processing Policy</personalDataPolicy>, and give <personalDataProcess>Consent to the processing of personal data</personalDataProcess>

fields.amenities_tip: Select at least 5 amenities available in your premise. The more amenities you select, the more users can find your premise.
fields.open_hours_example:
This form allows you to specify the cost of your hall per hour. It means that you can set different prices for different time intervals.

For example:
<bold>10:00-14:00 - 50 zl</bold>,
<bold>14:00-23:00 - 70 zl</bold>.

If the cost of your hall does not change during the day, it is recommended to fill it in like this:
<bold>10:00-23:00 - 50 zl</bold>

fields.open_hours_spread_mode: You can set these operating hours for the rest of the week
fields.open_hours_discounts_heading: Do you plan to offer discounts during a single day?
fields.open_hours_discounts_tip: If you plan to offer a discount, specify its conditions. The discount is given only for bookings of several hours and is valid only for one day.

my_bookings.heading: My Bookings
my_bookings.modal_cancel_confirmation_desc: Are you sure you want to cancel the booking?

conditions.FULL_REFUND_desc: Full refund, including all applicable fees, based on the cost of their booking
conditions.PARTIAL_REFUND_desc: 50% refund of the booking cost, excluding applicable fees

my_bookings.no_organization_warn_msg: Fill in your details in the "Profile" section

premise_types.special_events_etc: Banquet halls, estates for weddings, etc

booking_cancel_terms.very_flexible_desc: Guests can cancel their reservation up to 24 hours before the start of the event and receive a full refund, including all fees paid for the reservation. Bookings canceled less than 24 hours before the start of the event are non-refundable.
booking_cancel_terms.flexible_desc: Guests can cancel their booking up to 7 days before the start of the event and receive a full refund, including all applicable fees, based on the cost of their booking. If the booking is canceled between 7 days and 24 hours before the start of the event, guests will receive a 50% refund of the booking cost, excluding applicable fees. However, bookings canceled less than 24 hours before the start of the event are non-refundable.
booking_cancel_terms.default_30_desc: Guests can cancel their booking up to 30 days before the start of the event and receive a full refund, including all applicable fees. If the booking is canceled between 30 days and 7 days before the start of the event, guests are entitled to a 50% refund of the booking cost (excluding fees). Cancellation requests made less than 7 days before the start of the event are non-refundable.
booking_cancel_terms.default_90_desc: Guests can cancel their booking up to 90 days before the start of the event and receive a full refund, including all applicable fees. If the booking is canceled between 90 days and 14 days before the start of the event, guests are entitled to a 50% refund of the booking cost (excluding fees). Cancellation requests made less than 14 days before the start of the event are non-refundable.

b2b.title: Do you have a venue for events?
b2b.subtitle: Get more bookings with us
b2b.advantages_title: Eventify is a unique service for fast and convenient venue bookings
b2b.premise_type_section_title: We work with the main types of venues:

registration_guide_steps.2: Fill in the form "Register your company"
registration_guide_steps.3: Open your email verification and click the link
registration_guide_steps.4: Go into your personal account and fill in the required fields with business information

b2b.register_title: Register for free on our platform now and receive:

bonus.1: The first 5 bookings of your location with a 0% commission
bonus.2: A guide on how to effectively design your page on our platform for high conversion

1.title: How do I list my venue on the platform?
1.content: Listing your venue is simple. Create an account, fill in your venue details (address, amenities, photos, pricing), and publish it. Our team may review the listing to ensure it meets quality standards before approval.

2.title: What types of venues are accepted?
2.content: We accept various types of venues, including photo studios, dance studios, yoga spaces, conference halls, banquet halls, co-working spaces, sports halls, and more. The space should be safe, well-maintained, and accessible for hourly rentals.

3.title: Is there a fee to list my venue?
3.content: Listing your venue is typically free. The platform takes a service fee of 15% from confirmed bookings, which is deducted automatically. Detailed fee structures are available in your account dashboard.

4.title: How do I manage bookings and cancellations?
4.content: You can manage bookings, choose to approve or decline requests, and set cancellation policies through your dashboard. Automated notifications will keep you updated on upcoming bookings and customer inquiries.

5.title: Can I set my pricing and availability?
5.content: Yes, you have full control over your pricing, availability, and booking conditions. You can set special prices for peak hours, holidays, or events.

6.title: How do I receive payments for bookings?
6.content: Payments are processed through a secure Stripe payment system and transferred twice a month to the bank account you put down in your company profile.

7.title: How do I manage cancellations?
7.content: Through your dashboard, you can manage bookings, approve or decline requests, and set cancellation policies. However, once a booking is confirmed and paid, it cannot be canceled by the venue owner or the customer to ensure reliability for both parties. It’s important to keep your availability updated to avoid conflicts.

8.title: What can I do if I'm concerned about the safety of my premises during a booking?
8.content:
If you are concerned about your premises, we recommend that you or an authorized representative be present during the rental period. This allows you to oversee the use of your space and ensure that the acceptance process is carried out according to your rules.

If you have security cameras and notice any damage to your premises, please report the incident to us via email (eventify.scaleway@gmail.com), attaching relevant video clips or evidence. We will provide you with the contact information of the person who made the booking so you can address the issue directly—whether by contacting them to resolve it, discussing it in person, or filing a formal report if necessary.
